# Improve Error Messages

## ðŸŸ¢ Low Priority

### Summary
Error messages too technical for users.

### Implementation
Review all user-facing errors. Make messages actionable with suggestions. Avoid technical jargon. Test all error states.

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Review all error messages
- [ ] Make messages actionable
- [ ] Add resolution suggestions
- [ ] Avoid technical jargon
- [ ] Test error states

### Estimated Effort
3-4 hours
